name: Winter Wonderland Project (dolphin64532)
description:
-Use your cursor to move around the scene (preferably use a mouse and a mousepad_

-Use the WSAD keys to move forwards, backwards, left, and right respectively. 

Credits: 

Omar Santiago- for the videos he spent teaching me

LUKAS BOBOR-The windmill and building assets

BROKEN VECTOR-Low Poly Winter Pack

GREGORY SEGURU- PBR MEDIEVAL HOUSES PACK

Lesfm-Pixabay music titled "Christian Atmosphere".

Sorcerer-Youtuber who showed me how to upload music in my game. 

You are a nutracker citizen living in the peaceful and joyous village of WinterTown. Though it is a bit secluded, you are your neighbors fish together in the nearby lake, hunt wildlife together, and cut down trees together. It's a peaceful life especially when during the winter season. However, one day while you and the town is asleep, multiple severe earthquakes occur sending sharp ice and snow upwards and blocking part of the town. Fortunately for your town, nobody is injured but unfortunately for your town, a huge active volcano has formed and it threatens the inhabitants of WinterTown. A severe blizzard is initiated meanwhile you notice dark clouds forming in the distance. Your objective  is to find the nutcracker citizens and warn them.  Also, feel free to enjoy all of what the world has to offer.
